subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of thousands of fans lined Amsterdam’s canals to cheer the World Cup runner-up Netherlands as the team cruised the waterways, swigging beer and blowing vuvuzelas, in an open-top boat.
snippet: Hundreds of thousands of fans lined Amsterdam’s canals to cheer the World Cup runner-up Netherlands as the team cruised the waterways, swigging beer and blowing vuvuzelas, in an open-top boat.
